WorkItem.Description: When viewing the gear list comparison bar graphs quite often the total rating value will be displayed past the right edge of the chosen scale range and therefore will not be visible.  Occasionally the bars  themselves will be truncated and the top portion will be displayed past the end of the chosen range.  I don't believe I've seen the low end (when using relative bars) ever get cut off.
WorkItem.Summary: Automatic rating scale range truncates bars and totals
